programme.title: DP World Tour Championship Dubai Day 4 2021
programme.desc: Collin Morikawa won the 2021 DP World Tour Championship at 17-under, clinching the Race to Dubai title!

programme.title: BMW International Open Highlights Show 2025
programme.desc: Dan Brown secured an emotional two shot victory to lift the 2025 BMW International Open trophy.

programme.title: Danish Golf Championship Highlights Show 2024
programme.desc: Frederic Lacroix won his first DP World Tour title at the Danish Golf Championship, closing with a bogey-free 65 for a four-shot victory.

programme.title: Betfred British Masters Highlights Show 2024
programme.desc: Niklas Norgaard won the 2024 Betfred British Masters at 16-under, securing a two-shot victory at The Belfry.

programme.title: Omega European Masters Highlights Show 2024
programme.desc: Matt Wallace ended a six-year drought with victory after 73 holes but finished 112th in the FedEx Cup, missing the playoffs.

programme.title: Amgen Irish Open Highlights Show 2024
programme.desc: Rasmus Hojgaard won the 2024 Irish Open with a score of nine-under, one stroke ahead of Rory McIlroy.

programme.title: BMW PGA Championship Highlights Show 2024
programme.desc: Billy Horschel defeated Rory McIlroy on the second playoff hole at the BMW PGA Championship, making an eagle on the par-5 18th. Horschel birdied 18 in regulation to tie McIlroy and Thriston Lawrence, who was eliminated after the first playoff hole.

programme.title: Genesis Scottish Open Day 4 2022
programme.desc: Xander Schauffele won the 2022 Scottish Open at 7-under, marking his second straight tournament win

programme.title: Australian PGA Highlights show 2022
programme.desc: Cameron Smith won the 2022 Australian PGA Championship at Royal Queensland, finishing at 21-under-par

programme.title: BMW PGA Championship Day 4 2022
programme.desc: Shane Lowry won the 2022 BMW PGA Championship at 17-under, beating McIlroy and Rahm by one stroke.

programme.title: Roots: Shane Lowry
programme.desc: Roots follows Shane Lowry back to County Offaly, exploring his Irish upbringing and family roots in Clara.

programme.title: Chase The Ace: Shane Lowry vs Tommy Fleetwood
programme.desc: Irishman vs Englishman battle it out with 50 balls each

programme.desc: Shane Lowry and Bob MacIntyre draw random clubs for each shot at the Luck of the Draw challenge at the Abu Dhabi HSBC Championship.
